activities: Treehouse collects information that our students choose to share with us directly from our students. This information can include their names, locations, past work experience, languages spoken, and whether or not they are looking for work. We use this information to improve our product for our students, and if students opt-in to our Talent Finder product to share with companies that may be interested in hiring our students. No personally identifiable information is shared with any third parties without the students' consent.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-line data, offline data, manually processed data, and human resources data
recoursemech:
For organization human resources data: EU DPAs and the Swiss FDPIC; 
For all other data: TRUSTe
